question:
Your friend has asked you to help him/her to ﬁnd a music teacher for his/her child. Write a letter to your friend that you have found a suitable teacher. In your letter, you should tell:

what experience the teacher has
why you think he/she is suitable
how to get in touch with the teacher.
write 150 words
text: It's been so long since we have spoken. How have you been? How is our dear little Ronit doing? You remember the last time we spoke, you had told me that you were looking for a music teacher for Ronit, so that he can learn classical music. I have found an excellent teacher for him.

I had been to a musical concert yesterday where I meet Mrs. Jane She has done her Masters in classical music and has been teaching young kids from the past five years. She has also been helping her students do live concerts.

Although she has vast experience and qualifications, I believe she will be suitable for your son because she is very friendly with children. Moreover, I have received some good feedback from another friend whose daughter has been Mrs.Jane's student from past two years.
I have spoken to her regarding Ronit's admission. All you have to do is, call her on Thursday afternoon at 2.00pm on phone no: 0123456789. You can send her an email as well on: [email protected]
Write me back once you speak to her
